mdRecord.dcterms:description: Unattributed line from song "Terrible Love," by The National. Discussion of caliber of Harvard, Yale, and UVA, with responses. Declaration of confidence in looks, with responses. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
